sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button, Select, Input } from 'semantic-ui-react' const options = [ { key: 'title', text: 'Title', value: 'title' }, { key: 'author', text: 'Author', value: 'author' }, { key: 'genre', text: 'Genre', value: 'genre' }, ] const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() } export const SearchForm = () => (
